msg.msgText: The client request to publish a message to the server failed because the destination is not valid: ConnectionID={0} ClientID={1} Protocol={2} Endpoint={3}.

msgExplanation.p: A message could not be published because the topic name is not valid. This log entry is shown only once per connection.

msgUserResponse.p: Refer to the Message Gateway documentation for information about the rules for valid destination names.
